item.title: Source Code: TradingView Charts for Pancakeswap Tokens
item.description: This is an informational post for my extra available at BuyMeACoffee.com. Connect me on my email for any queries or feedback.
item.content:
This is an informational post for my extra available at BuyMeACoffee.com. Connect me on my email for any queries or feedback.

What will you get?

You will get a zip file with the source code for an OHLC Chart for PancakeSwap Tokens.

  • It uses TradingView Techincal Analysis Charts as the charting library and Bitquery.io APIs as the data provider.
  • Code is in HTML and Javascript.
  • Prices in the charts are in BUSD.
  • Supports both Pancakeswap v1 and v2 tokens
  • Supports 1m,5m,15m,30m,1h,4h,12d,1d,7d timeframes
View in new tab

Live Preview - Chart for PancakeSwap Token (CAKE)

Screenshots

How to use it?

You can view the chart by starting a local server and opening it in your browser. You can also host it with any HTTP server like Nginx and Apache on a remote server. These are static files and don’t need a server component other than to host them.

Before you buy

There are a couple of prerequisites that you need to take care of.

  • Access to a copy of TradingView Technical Analysis Charts
  • An API Key from Bitquery.io

Important Notes

  • The chart is not integrated with a WebSocket or a live feed as Bitquery.io doesn’t provide one. Hence, the chart will not update automatically, and you will have to refresh it manually to see the latest data.

Looking for a Developer?

I offer a few services related to TradinView charting libraries at buymeacoffee.com.

item.title: TradingView Charts for PancakeSwap Tokens
item.content:
Update - Live Preview

I have added a live preview of the charts using the Technical charts from TradingView. Source code of these charts is available.

View in new tab

Live Preview - Chart for PancakeSwap Token (CAKE)

PancakeSwap Cheaper and faster than Uniswap? Discover PancakeSwap, the leading DEX on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) with the best farms in Defi and a lottery for CAKE.

This showcases a couple of OHLC Charts for Pancakeswap Tokens implemented using the TradingView Lightweight Charts and Bitquery.io APIs.

TradingView Techincal Analysis Charts can replace the Lightweight Charts. You would need to request access to the technical charts on their website to use them.

I run a gig on Fiverr.com to help with such integrations and customizations. You can also connect with me on Discord.

If you are new to Fiverr, you can use my referral link to signup and get 20% off on your first order.

OHLC Chart with Bitquery GraphQL API

  • Uses TradingView Lightweight Charts library
  • Integrates with Bitquery.io GraphQL API
  • Shows prices (WBNB) for Pancakeswap tokens
  • Plots both candlestick and bar charts
View in new tab

CAKE/WBNB - A sample integration of TradingView Lightweight Chart library with Bitquery GraphQL API to showcase candlestick chart for PancakeSwap Tokens. Uses Parcel as the bundler.

Chart for another Token

By default, plots a chart for PancakeSwap (CAKE) token. Setting ?token=<token_address> URL parameter plots for another by its address. Below is a sample for UniSwap (UNI) token.

View in new tab

UNI/WBNB - A sample integration of TradingView Lightweight Chart library with Bitquery GraphQL API to showcase candlestick chart for PancakeSwap Tokens. Uses Parcel as the bundler.

Looking for a Developer?

I offer a few services related to TradinView charting libraries at buymeacoffee.com.
